trans-unit.source: Represents the digitizer device of a Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: 代表 Tablet PC 上的數位板裝置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>報表目前平板電腦裝置的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>報表目前平板電腦裝置的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: 取得系統上平板電腦裝置的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: 平板電腦裝置的系統上唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得平板電腦裝置的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 平板電腦裝置的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the product identifier for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得平板電腦裝置的產品識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The manufacturer of the tablet device is responsible for adding this string.
trans-unit.target: 平板電腦裝置的製造商都會負責將加入這個字串。

trans-unit.source: The return value is empty if the tablet device does not have an identifier.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值為空白如果平板電腦裝置的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The product identifier for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 平板電腦裝置的產品識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref> associated with the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref>平板電腦裝置的相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref> associated with the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"> </xref>平板電腦裝置的相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>支援。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> supports.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>支援。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref> for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref>平板電腦裝置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref> for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"> </xref>平板電腦裝置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>提供如平板電腦裝置的基本輸入的處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref>提供如平板電腦裝置的基本輸入的處理。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 傳回平板電腦裝置的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>其中包含名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref> of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref>的平板電腦裝置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref> of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"> </xref>的平板電腦裝置。
